text.textblock: UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE BOARD OF GOVERNORS
Addition of the following item to the closed meeting agenda:

At its meeting on January 3, 1994, the Board of Governors of the United States Postal Service voted unanimously to add to the agenda ``Consideration of Rate Case Filing,'' and that discussion on the item was closed to the public pursuant to section 552b(c) (3) and (10) of Title 5, United States Code; section 410(c)(4) of Title 39, United States Code; and section 7.3 (c) and (j) of Title 39, Code of Federal Regulations and that no earlier announcement was possible. In accordance with 552b(f)(1) of Title 5, United States Code, and section 7.6(a) of Title 39, Code of Federal Regulations, the General Counsel of the United States Postal Service certified that in her opinion discussion of this item could be properly closed to public observation.
